div.p:
Greetings from Sayans Publishers LLP! Your submission has been received.
Submission Number:
Title:
Corresponding author(s):

We are pleased to acknowledge the receipt of your manuscript titled "" submitted through our online platform, mySayans. We genuinely appreciate your interest in publishing with us and are thrilled to have the opportunity to review your work.
Your manuscript has been assigned a unique identification number: . Please refer to this number in all future correspondence related to your submission.

Here's what happens next:
Initial Assessment: Your manuscript will undergo an initial screening to ensure it meets our publishing standards and scope. This process typically takes 2-10 days.
Peer Review: If your manuscript passes the initial assessment, it will be sent for peer review. The review process can take several weeks, depending on the availability of suitable reviewers and the level of revision required.
Decision and Feedback: Once the review process is complete, we will communicate our decision (accept, minor revisions, major revisions, or reject) along with the reviewers' feedback.

t.p: We are committed to a fair and constructive review process and aim to support our authors throughout. Please feel free to reach out to us at should you have any questions or require further assistance.

div.p: Thank you for choosing Sayans Publishers LLP as the platform to share your research and insights. We look forward to engaging with your manuscript and will be in touch with updates as we progress through the review stages.
